publicwhip.spmotion: * S2M-2559 Rob Gibson:Clearances Denial—That the Parliament notes with astonishment recent claims by “historian” Michael Fry, previewing his forthcoming book, that the Highland clearances were a myth; questions the author’s selective use of source material; deplores his assertion that the Sutherland clearances were an early example of deliberate displacement of people similar to the housing policies of the post-World War Two Labour government, and recognises that throughout the Highlands and Islands many thousands of people were forcibly evicted from their ancestral lands and that depopulated glens, straths and islands remain a testament to those clearances to this day.

S2M-2559 Clearances Denial (lodged on 9 March 2005) Brian Adam*, Mr Mark Ruskell*, Stewart Stevenson*, Richard Lochhead*, Shiona Baird*, Eleanor Scott*, Alex Neil*, Robin Harper*, Tommy Sheridan*, Fergus Ewing*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Campbell Martin*, Michael Matheson*, Carolyn Leckie*, Jim Mather*, Mr Bruce McFee*, George Lyon*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Dr Jean Turner*, Ms Sandra White*, Mr John Swinney*
